# Cross-pane scroll activation (2026-01-18 17:34Z)

_**User (2026-01-18 15:24Z)**_

whe I do CTRL + molette on the left pan it activates scroll in the right pan, it should not !

---

_**Agent (model gpt-5.2-codex, mode Agent)**_

---

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Analyzing wheel event propagation issues**

CTRL+wheel on the graph sidebar likely bubbles and triggers scrolling in the chat pane; preventDefault alone isn't stopping this. Stopping propagation on the sidebar's wheel event when Ctrl is pressed seems necessary to contain zoom behavior and prevent unintended scrolls in the main chat area.
**Planning precise wheel event handling**

Wheel events with Ctrl on the sidebar—especially the list view—bubble and scroll the chat pane unintentionally. To fix this, adding an onWheel handler on the sidebar that prevents default and stops propagation only when Ctrl is pressed will preserve normal sidebar scrolling while isolating zoom behavior. Next, verifying sidebar scroll styles will confirm this approach.</details></think>

---

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Assessing wheel event handling on sidebar and graph**

The sidebar's overflow hidden allows wheel events there to scroll the body (chat), while the graph view zooms on all wheel events without ctrl. The current `preventDefault` may not fully stop body scrolling, especially with ctrl+wheel triggering browser zoom. Adding `stopPropagation` could better block wheel events from bubbling and causing unwanted scroll.
**Planning wheel event handlers with ctrlKey checks**

To fix ctrl+wheel bubbling scrolling the right pane from the left, a sidebar onWheel handler will preventDefault and stopPropagation when ctrlKey is pressed, letting normal wheel pass through. The graph’s wheel handler will always stopPropagation to prevent body scroll while zooming. This approach preserves zoom and limits unwanted scroll propagation.</details></think>

{\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const nextMessages = node.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n        if (i !== msgIdx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n        return {\n          ...m,\n          content: wrapFirstMatchWithTempHighlight(m.content, selectionPopover.text, tempId),\n        };\n      });\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: { ...node, messages: nextMessages } };\n    });\n    setTempHighlight({ nodeId, messageIndex: msgIdx, tempId });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n  }, [\n    selectionPopover.visible,\n    selectionPopover.text,\n    selectionPopover.messageIndex,\n    selectionPopover.nodeId,\n  ]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext, isContextModalOpen]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    updateNode(activeNodeId, (node) =&gt; {\n      if (!node?.hasUnread) return node;\n      return {\n        ...node,\n        hasUnread: false,\n        requestStatus: node.requestStatus === \"ready\" ? \"idle\" : node.requestStatus,\n      };\n    });\n  }, [activeNodeId]);\n\n  const addNode = (parentId, title, messages, extra = {}, options = {}) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      setActiveNodeId(id);\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const updateNodeMessages = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      return {\n        ...prev,\n        [nodeId]: {\n          ...node,\n          messages: updater(node.messages),\n        },\n      };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const updateNode = (nodeId, updater) =&gt; {\n    setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n      const node = prev[nodeId];\n      if (!node) return prev;\n      const next = typeof updater === \"function\" ? updater(node) : { ...node, ...updater };\n      if (next === node) return prev;\n      return { ...prev, [nodeId]: next };\n    });\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", content: SYSTEM_PROMPT }];\n    if (hiddenContext &amp;&amp; hiddenContext.trim()) {\n      systemMessages.push({ role: \"system\", content: hiddenContext.trim() });\n    }\n    const response = await fetch(API_URL, {\n      method: \"POST\",\n      headers: {\n        Authorization: &#96;Bearer ${apiKey}&#96;,\n        \"Content-Type\": \"application/json\",\n      },\n      body: JSON.stringify({\n        model: MODEL,\n        messages: [...systemMessages, ...messages],\n        temperature: 0.2,\n      }),\n    });\n    if (!response.ok) {\n      const details = await response.text();\n      throw new Error(&#96;OpenAI error ${response.status}: ${details}&#96;);\n    }\n    const data = await response.json();\n    return data.choices?.[0]?.message?.content?.trim() ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return only the title, no quotes or punctuation.\",\n      \"\",\n      &#96;User request: ${truncateForContext(userMessage, 240)}&#96;,\n      branchExcerpt\n        ? &#96;Selected excerpt: ${truncateForContext(branchExcerpt, 240)}&#96;\n        : \"\",\n    ]\n      .filter(Boolean)\n      .join(\"\\n\");\n    return sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: prompt }]);\n  };\n\n  const handleSend = async (content) =&gt; {\n    if (!content.trim() || isLoading) return;\n    setError(\"\");\n    const trimmed = content.trim();\n    const nodeSnapshot = nodesById[activeNodeId];\n    const hiddenContext = shouldShowContext\n      ? buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById)\n      : \"\";\n    updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n      ...messages,\n      { role: \"user\", content: trimmed },\n    ]);\n    setDraft(\"\");\n    setIsLoading(true);\n    try {\n      const reply = await sendToOpenAI(\n        [...(nodeSnapshot?.messages ?? []), { role: \"user\", content: trimmed }],\n        hiddenContext,\n      );\n      updateNodeMessages(activeNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n    } finally {\n      setIsLoading(false);\n    }\n  };\n\n  const handleComposerKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; tempHighlight.nodeId === sourceNodeId) {\n      setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n        const sourceNode = prev[sourceNodeId];\n        if (!sourceNode) return prev;\n        const idx = tempHighlight.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = sourceNode.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: convertTempHighlightToBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              tempHighlight.tempId,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        });\n        return {\n          ...prev,\n          [sourceNodeId]: {\n            ...sourceNode,\n            messages: nextMessages,\n          },\n        };\n      });\n      setTempHighlight(null);\n    } else if (selectionPopover.messageIndex != null) {\n      setNodesById((prev) =&gt; {\n        const sourceNode = prev[sourceNodeId];\n        if (!sourceNode) return prev;\n        const idx = selectionPopover.messageIndex;\n        const nextMessages = sourceNode.messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n          if (i !== idx || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n          return {\n            ...m,\n            content: wrapFirstMatchWithBranchHighlight(\n              m.content,\n              selectionPopover.text,\n              highlightId,\n              newNodeId,\n            ),\n          };\n        });\n        return {\n          ...prev,\n          [sourceNodeId]: {\n            ...sourceNode,\n            messages: nextMessages,\n          },\n        };\n      });\n    }\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: false,\n      text: \"\",\n      rect: null,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: \"above\",\n      messageIndex: null,\n      nodeId: null,\n    });\n    window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n    try {\n      // Build context against a snapshot that includes the new node (setState is async).\n      const nodesWithNew = {\n        ...nodesById,\n        [newNodeId]: {\n          id: newNodeId,\n          parentId: sourceNodeId,\n          title: fallbackTitle,\n          messages: [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n          branchContext: {\n            excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n            sourceNodeId,\n            createdAt: Date.now(),\n          },\n          requestStatus: \"pending\",\n          hasUnread: false,\n        },\n      };\n      const hiddenContext = buildHiddenContextForNode(newNodeId, nodesWithNew);\n      const replyPromise = sendToOpenAI([{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }], hiddenContext);\n      const titlePromise = requestBranchTitle(userMessage, branchExcerpt);\n      titlePromise\n        .then((title) =&gt; {\n          const nextTitle = normalizeGeneratedTitle(title, fallbackTitle);\n          updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({ ...node, title: nextTitle }));\n        })\n        .catch(() =&gt; { });\n\n      const reply = await replyPromise;\n      updateNodeMessages(newNodeId, (messages) =&gt; [\n        ...messages,\n        { role: \"assistant\", content: reply || \"No response returned.\" },\n      ]);\n      updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"ready\",\n        hasUnread: true,\n      }));\n    } catch (err) {\n      setError(err.message || \"Failed to reach OpenAI.\");\n      updateNode(newNodeId, (node) =&gt; ({\n        ...node,\n        requestStatus: \"idle\",\n      }));\n    }\n  };\n\n  const getSelectionPayload = () =&gt; {\n    const selection = window.getSelection();\n    if (!selection || selection.isCollapsed) return null;\n    const anchorNode = selection.anchorNode;\n    const focusNode = selection.focusNode;\n    if (\n      !chatAreaRef.current ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(anchorNode) ||\n      !chatAreaRef.current.contains(focusNode)\n    ) {\n      return null;\n    }\n    const text = selection.toString().trim();\n    if (!text) return null;\n    const range = selection.getRangeAt(0);\n    const rect = range.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const placement = rect.top &gt; 220 ? \"above\" : \"below\";\n    const top = placement === \"above\" ? rect.top - 8 : rect.bottom + 8;\n    const left = Math.min(rect.left, window.innerWidth - 320);\n\n    const startContainer =\n      range.startContainer?.nodeType === Node.TEXT_NODE\n        ? range.startContainer.parentElement\n        : range.startContainer;\n    const messageEl = startContainer?.closest?.(\".message\");\n    const messageIndexRaw = messageEl?.dataset?.messageIndex;\n    const messageIndex =\n      messageIndexRaw != null &amp;&amp; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n    const children = childrenMap[nodeId] || [];\n    const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n    const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n    return (\n      &lt;div key={nodeId}&gt;\n        &lt;button\n          className={&#96;tree-item ${activeNodeId === nodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"} ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"\n            }&#96;}\n          style={{ paddingLeft: &#96;${12 + depth * 16}px&#96; }}\n          onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n          onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n          type=\"button\"\n        &gt;\n          &lt;span className=\"tree-item-label\"&gt;\n            &lt;span className=\"tree-title\"&gt;{node.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n            {isPending &amp;&amp; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n      window.removeEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    };\n  }, [sidebarWidth]);\n\n  const handleGraphWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s, offsetX, offsetY } = getSvgViewport(\n      rect,\n      graphLayout.width,\n      graphLayout.height,\n    );\n    const delta = event.deltaY &gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleSidebarWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    event.stopPropagation();\n  };\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    resizeStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startWidth: sidebarWidth,\n    };\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside\n        className=\"sidebar\"\n        style={{ width: &#96;${sidebarWidth}px&#96; <think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Diagnosing wheel event handling issue**

The ctrl+wheel event likely triggers browser zoom or bubbles to body scroll despite attempts to stop it; I need to prevent default on the sidebar's wheel events, possibly using onWheelCapture or adding a non-passive listener to intercept and stop propagation correctly.
**Planning non-passive wheel listener on sidebar**

React's wheel handler may be passive, so to reliably prevent ctrl+wheel browser zoom and scrolling, I'll add a native non-passive wheel listener on the sidebar via a ref using useEffect to preventDefault and stopPropagation when ctrlKey is pressed.</details></think>

}\n          return;\n        }\n\n        transformNode(child);\n        nextChildren.push(child);\n      });\n      node.children = nextChildren;\n      return;\n    }\n\n };\n};\n\nconst remarkLatexDelimiters = () =&gt; {\n  const normalizeDelimiters = (value) =&gt;\n    value\n      .replace(/\\\\\\[/g, \"$$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\]/g, \"$$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\(/g, \"$\")\n      .replace(/\\\\\\)/g, \"$\");\n\n  const transformNode = (node, inCode = false) =&gt; {\n    if (!node || typeof node !== \"object\") return;\n    const nextInCode = transformNode(tree);\n  };\n};\n\nconst createRootNode = () =&gt; ({\n  id: \"root\",\n  parentId: null,\n  title: \"Root\",\n  messages: [\n\n  ],\n});\n\nconst STORAGE_KEY =     positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", selectionPopover.treeId,\n  ]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    if (!shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen) {\n      setIsContextModalOpen(false);\n    }\n  }, [shouldShowContext,      ...node,\n        hasUnread: false,\n        requestStatus: node.requestStatus === \"ready\" ? \"idle\" : node.requestStatus,\n      };\n    });\n  }, [activeTreeId, activeNodeId]);\n\n  const addNode = (treeId, parentId, title, messages, extra = {}, options = {}) =&gt; {\n    const id = crypto.randomUUID();\n    const shouldActivate = options.activate !== false;\n    updateTreeNodes(treeId, (prev) =&gt; ({\n      ...prev,\n      [id]: {\n        id,\n        parentId,\n        title,\n        messages,\n        ...extra,\n      },\n    }));\n    if (shouldActivate) {\n      updateTree(treeId, (tree) =&gt; ({ ...tree, activeNodeId: id }));\n    }\n    return id;\n  };\n\n  const sendToOpenAI = async (messages, hiddenContext = \"\") =&gt; {\n    const apiKey = import.meta.env.VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY;\n    if (!apiKey) {\n      throw new Error(\"Missing VITE_OPENAI_API_KEY in .env\");\n    }\n    const systemMessages = [{ role: \"system\", ?? \"\";\n  };\n\n  const requestBranchTitle = async (userMessage, branchExcerpt) =&gt; {\n    const prompt = [\n      \"Generate a concise 2-4 word title for this branch request.\",\n      \"Return nodesById[activeNodeId];\n    const hiddenContext = shouldShowContext\n      ? buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById)\n      : \"\";\n    updateNodeMessages(activeTreeId, activeNodeId, {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleSend(draft);\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchKeyDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.key !== \"Enter\") return;\n    if (event.shiftKey) return;\n    event.preventDefault();\n    handleBranchSend();\n  };\n\n  const handleBranchSend = async () =&gt; {\n    if (!selectionPopover.text.trim() || !selectionPopover.draft.trim()) {\n      return;\n    }\n    setError(\"\");\n    const treeId = selectionPopover.treeId || activeTreeId;\n    if (!treeId) return;\n    const sourceNodeId = selectionPopover.nodeId || activeNodeId;\n    const userMessage = selectionPopover.draft.trim();\n    const fallbackTitle = \"...\";\n    const branchExcerpt = selectionPopover.text.trim();\n    const newNodeId = addNode(\n      treeId,\n      sourceNodeId,\n      fallbackTitle,\n      [{ role: \"user\", content: userMessage }],\n      {\n        branchContext: {\n          excerpt: branchExcerpt,\n          sourceNodeId,\n          createdAt: Date.now(),\n        },\n        requestStatus: \"pending\",\n        hasUnread: false,\n      },\n      { activate: false },\n    );\n    const highlightId = crypto.randomUUID();\n    if (tempHighlight &amp;&amp; {\n    const payload = getSelectionPayload();\n    if (!payload) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    if (!event?.shiftKey) {\n      if (selectionPopover.visible) {\n        setSelectionPopover({\n          visible: false,\n          text: \"\",\n          rect: null,\n          draft: \"\",\n          placement: \"above\",\n          messageIndex: null,\n          nodeId: null,\n          treeId: null,\n        });\n      }\n      return;\n    }\n\n    setSelectionPopover({\n      visible: true,\n      text: payload.text,\n      rect: payload.rect,\n      draft: \"\",\n      placement: payload.placement,\n      messageIndex: payload.messageIndex,\n      nodeId: activeNodeId,\n      treeId: activeTreeId,\n    });\n  };\n\n  const renderTree = (nodeId, depth = 0) =&gt; {\n    resizeInput(inputRef.current);\n  }, [draft]);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleMove = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (panStateRef.current.active) {\n        const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n        if (!container) return;\n        const dx = event.clientX - panStateRef.current.startX;\n        const dy = event.clientY - panStateRef.current.startY;\n        const s = panStateRef.current.viewportScale || 1;\n        setGraphTranslate({\n          x: panStateRef.current.tx + dx / s,\n          y: panStateRef.current.ty + dy / s,\n        });\n        return;\n      }\n      if (resizeStateRef.current.active) {\n        const dx = event.clientX - resizeStateRef.current.startX;\n        const nextWidth = Math.min(\n          Math.max(resizeStateRef.current.startWidth + dx, 240),\n          520,\n        );\n        setSidebarWidth(nextWidth);\n      }\n    };\n\n    const handleUp = () =&gt; {\n      panStateRef.current.active = false;\n      resizeStateRef.current.active = false;\n      document.body.classList.remove(\"is-resizing\");\n    };\n\n    window.addEventListener(\"mousemove\", handleMove);\n    window.addEventListener(\"mouseup\", handleUp);\n    return () =&gt; 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n    if (!sidebar) return;\n    const handleWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    sidebar.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel, { passive: false });\n    return () =&gt;     positions[nodeId] = { x: xCursor, y: depth * 160 + 70 };\n        xCursor += 220;\n        return;\n      }\n      children.forEach((childId) =&gt; {\n        edges.push({ from: nodeId, to: 0 ? 0.9 : 1.1;\n    const nextScale = Math.min(Math.max(graphScale * delta, 0.6), 3.2);\n    const pointerX = (event.clientX - rect.left - offsetX) / s;\n    const pointerY = (event.clientY - rect.top - offsetY) / s;\n    const graphX = (pointerX - graphTranslate.x) / graphScale;\n    const graphY = (pointerY - graphTranslate.y) / graphScale;\n    setGraphScale(nextScale);\n    setGraphTranslate({\n      x: pointerX - graphX * nextScale,\n      y: pointerY - graphY * nextScale,\n    });\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n    if (!sidebar) return;\n    const handleWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    sidebar.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel, { passive: false });\n    return () =&gt; sidebar.removeEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWheel);\n  }, []);\n\n  useEffect(() =&gt; {\n    const handleWindowWheel = (event) =&gt; {\n      if (!event.ctrlKey) return;\n      const sidebar = sidebarRef.current;\n      if (!sidebar) return;\n      if (!sidebar.contains(event.target)) return;\n      event.preventDefault();\n      event.stopPropagation();\n    };\n    window.addEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWindowWheel, {\n      passive: false,\n      capture: true,\n    });\n    return () =&gt; {\n      window.removeEventListener(\"wheel\", handleWindowWheel, {\n        capture: true,\n      });\n    };\n  }, []);\n\n  const handleGraphMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    if (event.button !== 0) return;\n    const container = graphContainerRef.current;\n    if (!container) return;\n    const rect = container.getBoundingClientRect();\n    const { scale: s } = getSvgViewport(rect, graphLayout.width, graphLayout.height);\n    panStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startY: event.clientY,\n      tx: graphTranslate.x,\n      ty: graphTranslate.y,\n      viewportScale: s,\n    };\n    setGraphHasInteracted(true);\n  };\n\n  const handleResizerMouseDown = (event) =&gt; {\n    event.preventDefault();\n    resizeStateRef.current = {\n      active: true,\n      startX: event.clientX,\n      startWidth: sidebarWidth,\n    };\n    document.body.classList.add(\"is-resizing\");\n  };\n\n  return (\n    &lt;div className=\"app\"&gt;\n      &lt;aside\n        className=\"sidebar\"\n        style={{ width: &#96;${sidebarWidth}px&#96; }}\n        ref={sidebarRef}\n      &gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"sidebar-header\"&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"sidebar-title-row\"&gt;\n            &lt;div&gt;\n              &lt;h1&gt;Chat Tree&lt;/h1&gt;\n              &lt;p &gt;\n                {treeList.length} {treeList.length === 1 ? \"tree\" : \"trees\"}\n              &lt;/p&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className=\"new-tree-button\"\n              onClick={createNewTree}\n            &gt;\n              New tree\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"tree-list\"&gt;\n            {treeList.map((tree) =&gt; {\n              const nodeCount = Object.keys(tree.nodesById || {}).length;\n              return (\n                &lt;button\n                  key={tree.id}\n                  type=\"button\"\n                  className={&#96;tree-switch ${tree.id === activeTreeId ? \"active\" : \"\"}&#96;}\n                  onClick={() =&gt; setActiveTreeId(tree.id)}\n                &gt;\n                  &lt;span className=\"tree-switch-title\"&gt;{tree.title}&lt;/span&gt;\n                  &lt;span className=\"tree-switch-meta\"&gt;\n                    {nodeCount} {nodeCount === 1 ? \"node\" : \"nodes\"}\n                  &lt;/span&gt;\n                &lt;/button&gt;\n              );\n            })}\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n\n          &lt;div className=\"view-toggle\"&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className={treeView === \"graph\" ? \"active\" : \"\"}\n              onClick={() =&gt; setTreeView(\"graph\")}\n              aria-label=\"Graph view\"\n              title=\"Graph view\"\n            &gt;\n              &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"6\" cy=\"6\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"18\" cy=\"6\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;circle cx=\"12\" cy=\"18\" r=\"2.5\" /&gt;\n                &lt;path d=\"M8 6h8M7.5 7.5l3.5 8M16.5 7.5l-3.5 8\" /&gt;\n              &lt;/svg&gt;\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className={treeView === \"list\" ? \"active\" : \"\"}\n              onClick={() =&gt; setTreeView(\"list\")}\n              aria-label=\"List view\"\n              title=\"List view\"\n            &gt;\n              &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                &lt;path d=\"M4 6h16M4 12h16M4 18h16\" /&gt;\n              &lt;/svg&gt;\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n        {treeView === \"graph\" ? (\n          &lt;div\n            className=\"tree-graph\"\n            ref={graphContainerRef}\n            onWheel={handleGraphWheel}\n            onMouseDown={handleGraphMouseDown}\n          &gt;\n            &lt;svg\n              width=\"100%\"\n              height=\"100%\"\n              viewBox={&#96;0 0 ${graphLayout.width} ${graphLayout.height}&#96;}\n              preserveAspectRatio=\"xMidYMin meet\"\n            &gt;\n              &lt;g\n                transform={&#96;translate(${graphTranslate.x} ${graphTranslate.y}) scale(${graphScale})&#96;}\n              &gt;\n                {graphLayout.edges.map((edge) =&gt; {\n                  const from = graphLayout.positions[edge.from];\n                  const to = graphLayout.positions[edge.to];\n                  if (!from || !to) return null;\n                  return (\n                    &lt;line\n                      key={&#96;${edge.from}-${edge.to}&#96;}\n                      x1={from.x}\n                      y1={from.y}\n                      x2={to.x}\n                      y2={to.y}\n                      className=\"graph-edge\"\n                    /&gt;\n                  );\n                })}\n                {Object.entries(graphLayout.positions).map(([nodeId, pos]) =&gt; {\n                  const node = nodesById[nodeId];\n                  const words = node.title.split(\" \").filter(Boolean);\n                  const isPending = node?.requestStatus === \"pending\";\n                  const isReady = node?.hasUnread;\n                  return (\n                    &lt;g\n                      key={nodeId}\n                      className={&#96;graph-node ${nodeId === activeNodeId ? \"active\" : \"\"\n                        } ${hoveredBranchNodeId === nodeId ? \"branch-hover\" : \"\"}&#96;}\n                      onClick={() =&gt; setActiveNodeId(nodeId)}\n                      onMouseEnter={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(nodeId)}\n                      onMouseLeave={() =&gt; setHoveredBranchNodeId(null)}\n                    &gt;\n                      &lt;circle cx={pos.x} cy={pos.y} r=\"34\" /&gt;\n                      {isPending &amp;&amp; (\n                        &lt;circle\n                          className=\"graph-node-badge pending\"\n                          cx={pos.x + 22}\n                          cy={pos.y - 22}\n                          r=\"6\"\n                        /&gt;\n                      )}\n                      {!isPending &amp;&amp; isReady &amp;&amp; (\n                        &lt;circle\n                          className=\"graph-node-badge ready\"\n                          cx={pos.x + 22}\n                          cy={pos.y - 22}\n                          r=\"6\"\n                        /&gt;\n                      )}\n                      &lt;text x={pos.x} y={pos.y} textAnchor=\"middle\"&gt;\n                        {words.length &gt; 1 ? (\n                          &lt;&gt;\n                            &lt;tspan x={pos.x} dy=\"-6\"&gt;\n                              {words[0]}\n                            &lt;/tspan&gt;\n                            &lt;tspan x={pos.x} dy=\"14\"&gt;\n                              {words.slice(1).join(\" \")}\n                            &lt;/tspan&gt;\n                          &lt;/&gt;\n                        ) : (\n                          &lt;tspan x={pos.x} dy=\"4\"&gt;\n                            {words[0]}\n                          &lt;/tspan&gt;\n                        )}\n                      &lt;/text&gt;\n                    &lt;/g&gt;\n                  );\n                })}\n              &lt;/g&gt;\n            &lt;/svg&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        ) : (\n          &lt;div className=\"tree\"&gt;{renderTree(\"root\")}&lt;/div&gt;\n        )}\n      &lt;/aside&gt;\n      &lt;div className=\"sidebar-resizer\" onMouseDown={handleResizerMouseDown} /&gt;\n      &lt;main className=\"chat\"&gt;\n        &lt;div className=\"chat-frame\"&gt;\n          {isEmptyThread ? (\n            &lt;div className=\"chat-empty\"&gt;\n              &lt;h1 className=\"chat-empty-title\"&gt;Where should we begin?&lt;/h1&gt;\n              {error &amp;&amp; &lt;div className=\"error-banner\"&gt;{error}&lt;/div&gt;}\n              &lt;div className=\"chat-input chat-input--empty\"&gt;\n                &lt;div className=\"composer\"&gt;\n                  &lt;textarea\n                    ref={inputRef}\n                    placeholder=\"Ask anything\"\n                    value={draft}\n                    onChange={(event) =&gt; {\n                      setDraft(event.target.value);\n                      resizeInput(event.target);\n                    }}\n                    onKeyDown={handleComposerKeyDown}\n                    rows={2}\n                  /&gt;\n                  &lt;button\n                    type=\"button\"\n                    className=\"send-button\"\n                    onClick={() =&gt; handleSend(draft)}\n                    disabled={isLoading || !draft.trim()}\n                    aria-label=\"Send message\"\n                    title=\"Send\"\n                  &gt;\n                    &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M22 2L11 13\" /&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M22 2l-7 20-4-9-9-4 20-7z\" /&gt;\n                    &lt;/svg&gt;\n                  &lt;/button&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n              &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          ) : (\n            &lt;&gt;\n              &lt;header className=\"chat-header\"&gt;\n                &lt;div&gt;\n                  &lt;h2&gt;{activeNode.title}&lt;/h2&gt;\n                  &lt;span className=\"chat-meta\"&gt;\n                    {activeNode.messages.length} messages\n                  &lt;/span&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n                {shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; (\n                  &lt;div className=\"chat-header-actions\"&gt;\n                    &lt;button\n                      type=\"button\"\n                      className=\"context-button\"\n                      onClick={() =&gt; setIsContextModalOpen(true)}\n                      aria-label=\"View AI context\"\n                      title=\"View AI context\"\n                    &gt;\n                      &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                        &lt;circle cx=\"12\" cy=\"12\" r=\"9\" /&gt;\n                        &lt;path d=\"M12 10.5v6\" /&gt;\n                        &lt;path d=\"M12 7.2h.01\" /&gt;\n                      &lt;/svg&gt;\n                    &lt;/button&gt;\n                  &lt;/div&gt;\n                )}\n              &lt;/header&gt;\n              &lt;section\n                className=\"chat-area\"\n                ref={chatAreaRef}\n                onMouseUp={handleSelection}\n              &gt;\n                {activeNode.messages.map((message, index) =&gt; (\n                  &lt;div\n                    key={&#96;${message.role}-${index}&#96;}\n                    className={&#96;message ${message.role}&#96;}\n                    data-message-index={index}\n                  &gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"message-role\"&gt;\n                      {message.role === \"user\" ? \"You\" : \"Assistant\"}\n                    &lt;/div&gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"message-content\"&gt;\n                      &lt;ReactMarkdown\n                        remarkPlugins={[\n                          remarkBranchHighlights,\n                          remarkLatexDelimiters,\n                          remarkGfm,\n                          remarkMath,\n                          remarkBreaks,\n                        ]}\n                        rehypePlugins={[rehypeKatex]}\n                        urlTransform={(url) =&gt; url}\n                        components={markdownComponents}\n                      &gt;\n                        {message.content}\n                      &lt;/ReactMarkdown&gt;\n                    &lt;/div&gt;\n                  &lt;/div&gt;\n                ))}\n                {isLoading &amp;&amp; (\n                  &lt;div className=\"message assistant message--thinking\"&gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"message-role\"&gt;Assistant&lt;/div&gt;\n                    &lt;div className=\"message-content\"&gt;\n                      &lt;span className=\"thinking\"&gt;Thinking...&lt;/span&gt;\n                    &lt;/div&gt;\n                  &lt;/div&gt;\n                )}\n                {error &amp;&amp; &lt;div className=\"error-banner\"&gt;{error}&lt;/div&gt;}\n              &lt;/section&gt;\n              &lt;footer className=\"chat-input\"&gt;\n                &lt;div className=\"composer\"&gt;\n                  &lt;textarea\n                    ref={inputRef}\n                    placeholder=\"Ask anything\"\n                    value={draft}\n                    onChange={(event) =&gt; {\n                      setDraft(event.target.value);\n                      resizeInput(event.target);\n                    }}\n                    onKeyDown={handleComposerKeyDown}\n                    rows={3}\n                  /&gt;\n                  &lt;button\n                    type=\"button\"\n                    className=\"send-button\"\n                    onClick={() =&gt; handleSend(draft)}\n                    disabled={isLoading || !draft.trim()}\n                    aria-label=\"Send message\"\n                    title=\"Send\"\n                  &gt;\n                    &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M22 2L11 13\" /&gt;\n                      &lt;path d=\"M22 2l-7 20-4-9-9-4 20-7z\" /&gt;\n                    &lt;/svg&gt;\n                  &lt;/button&gt;\n                &lt;/div&gt;\n              &lt;/footer&gt;\n            &lt;/&gt;\n          )}\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      &lt;/main&gt;\n      {shouldShowContext &amp;&amp; isContextModalOpen &amp;&amp; (\n        &lt;div\n          className=\"modal-overlay\"\n          role=\"dialog\"\n          aria-modal=\"true\"\n          aria-label=\"AI context\"\n          onClick={() =&gt; setIsContextModalOpen(false)}\n        &gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"modal\" onClick={(e) =&gt; e.stopPropagation()}&gt;\n            &lt;div className=\"modal-header\"&gt;\n              &lt;div className=\"modal-title\"&gt;AI context&lt;/div&gt;\n              &lt;button\n                type=\"button\"\n                className=\"modal-close\"\n                onClick={() =&gt; setIsContextModalOpen(false)}\n                aria-label=\"Close\"\n              &gt;\n                &lt;svg viewBox=\"0 0 24 24\" aria-hidden=\"true\"&gt;\n                  &lt;path d=\"M6 6l12 12M18 6L6 18\" /&gt;\n                &lt;/svg&gt;\n              &lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n            &lt;div className=\"modal-body\"&gt;\n              &lt;pre className=\"context-preview\"&gt;\n                {buildHiddenContextForNode(activeNodeId, nodesById) || \"No context.\"}\n              &lt;/pre&gt;\n            &lt;/div&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      )}\n      {selectionPopover.visible &amp;&amp; ({\n                ...prev,\n                draft: event.target.value,\n              }))\n            }\n            onKeyDown={handleBranchKeyDown}\n            rows={3}\n          /&gt;\n          &lt;div className=\"selection-actions\"&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              onClick={() =&gt; {\n                setSelectionPopover({\n                  visible: false,\n                  text: \"\",\n                  rect: null,\n                  draft: \"\",\n                  placement: \"above\",\n                  messageIndex: null,\n                  nodeId: null,\n                  treeId: null,\n                });\n                if (tempHighlight) {\n                  updateNodeMessages(tempHighlight.treeId, tempHighlight.nodeId, (messages) =&gt;\n                    messages.map((m, i) =&gt; {\n                      if (i !== tempHighlight.messageIndex || typeof m?.content !== \"string\") return m;\n                      return {\n                        ...m,\n                        content: removeTempHighlightById(m.content, tempHighlight.tempId),\n                      };\n                    }),\n                  );\n                  setTempHighlight(null);\n                }\n                window.getSelection()?.removeAllRanges?.();\n              }}\n            &gt;\n              Cancel\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n            &lt;button\n              type=\"button\"\n              className=\"primary\"\n              onClick={handleBranchSend}\n              disabled={!selectionPopover.draft.trim()}\n            &gt;\n              Create branch\n            &lt;/button&gt;\n          &lt;/div&gt;\n        &lt;/div&gt;\n      )}\n    &lt;/div&gt;\n  );\n};\n\nexport default App;\n"
```json
}
```

I added a window-level capture listener that blocks ctrl+wheel whenever the event target is inside the sidebar. That should stop the chat pane from scrolling even if the wheel event bubbles past React.

Give it another try on the graph now. If it still scrolls, I’ll add a stronger guard to lock the chat container’s wheel while ctrl is held over the left pane.
